snippet: A live HD broadcast of “The Bright Stream” from the Bolshoi Ballet, showed off the company’s comedic talent in new ways.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews live HD broadcast of Alexei Ratmansky ballet The Bright Stream, performed by the Bolshoi Ballet in Moscow.
lead_paragraph: A live HD broadcast of “The Bright Stream” from the Bolshoi Ballet, showed off the company’s comedic talent in new ways.

headline.seo: Bolshoi’s Live HD Broadcast of ‘The Bright Stream’
headline.main: Live From Moscow, Adulterers and a Ballerina With a Hairy Chest
headline.print_headline: Live From Moscow, Adulterers And a Ballerina With a Hairy Chest
